title: Ziina Purple: Fintech Subscription
blurb: Designed a go-to-market strategy for Ziina, a UAE-based peer-to-peer payments app, analyzing fintech trends, defining benefits, and integrating the Ziina Card.

title: First Goal Impact Analysis: La Liga 2023â€“24
blurb: Analyzed 380 La Liga (Spanish soccer league) matches to study how scoring first affects win probability. Built predictive models in Python (Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forest) and used clustering to profile team strategies.
